com.qbpsimulator.engine

Class BPSimulator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.qbpsimulator.engine.BPSimulator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ISimulationLimits

    public class BPSimulator
extends Object
implements ISimulationLimits
    Class for the main entry point to the simulation process. Use: BPSimulator sim = new BPSimulator("myProcessModel.bpmn"); sim.run();
    Author:
    Madis Abel

        public Activity getCatchActivity(int parentProcessIndex,
                                 int subProcessIndex,
                                 String eventCode)
        Returns intermediate or error event catch activity
        Parameters:
        parentProcessIndex - -1 for main process, index of process from where to search the event handler
        subProcessIndex - Sub-process index that threw an event
        eventCode - Event code to handle
        Returns:
        Activity representing a boundary catch event.
